system.description:
You gain proficiency in one of the following skill: Arcana, Nature or Religion. If you are already proficient in the chosen skill, you instead gain an expertise die.

In addition, your affinity with divination and having been exposed to the truths of the universe allows you to ignore the first time you would gain a level of strife. Once you have used this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest.
